page.name: Girls 4 Girls
page.description: Girls 4 Girls is designed to give all girls a safe place to come together and target the unique challenges girls face in our modern world. This club will give girls the tools and confidence they need to help create a kinder and more supportive girl-to-girl environment. Our mission is to create a safe and welcoming space to connect and support each other. The MHS Girls 4 Girls high school mentors plan and run each meeting to make an authentic experience to create and build friendships.
